title: Open Source Funding Case Studies
description: Explore case studies on open source funding strategies, including Red Hat's enterprise model, GitLab's hybrid licensing, Blender's community crowdfunding, Mozilla's partnerships, and Open Collective's transparency approach. Learn how these models sustain open source projects.
keywords: Open source funding, Red Hat case study, GitLab model, Blender crowdfunding, Mozilla revenue, Open Collective transparency, open source funding strategies, sustainability in open source
